hero.subtitle: Premium Dental Clinic Moinești
hero.description: We combine cutting-edge technology with personalized care to give you a healthy and beautiful smile.

welcome.subtitle: Welcome
welcome.paragraph1: At Smile Studio we have created a space where medical professionalism blends with advanced techniques, along with empathy and patience. Every detail of our office has been designed to transform your visit to the dentist into a pleasant experience.

team.subtitle: Our Team
team.title: The doctors who define your
team.description: Dedicated professionals with experience and passion for modern dentistry

services.subtitle: Services
services.title: Complete
services.description: From routine check-ups to complex treatments, we offer the full range of dental services.

equipment.subtitle: Equipment
equipment.title: Cutting-edge
equipment.description: We constantly invest in modern equipment to provide you with precise, comfortable, and highest quality treatments.
equipment.facialScannerDesc: Creates a complete digital image of your face, enabling precise planning of aesthetic and prosthetic treatments. Helps visualize the final result before starting treatment.
equipment.intraoralScannerDesc: Takes digital impressions of teeth without traditional impression materials. Offers maximum comfort and high precision for crowns, veneers, and orthodontic appliances.
equipment.intraoralCameraDesc: Allows detailed visualization of the oral cavity on a screen. Helps you see exactly what the doctor sees and better understand the condition of your teeth and recommended treatments.
equipment.laserDesc: Enables minimally invasive treatments for gums and soft tissues. Reduces bleeding, accelerates healing, and provides increased comfort during procedures.
equipment.shadeDetectorDesc: Accurately determines the natural shade of your teeth. Ensures perfect color matching for crowns, veneers, and restorations, for a natural and aesthetic result.
equipment.endomotorDesc: Precision instrument for root canal treatments. Allows cleaning and shaping of root canals with maximum accuracy, reducing treatment time and increasing success rate.
equipment.apexLocatorDesc: Electronically measures the exact length of the root canal. Increases the precision of endodontic treatments and reduces the need for multiple X-rays during the procedure.
equipment.autoclaveDesc: Completely sterilizes all medical instruments at high temperatures and pressures. Guarantees maximum safety and compliance with the strictest hygiene and infection control standards.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.intro: Smile Studio, located in Moinești, Ion Creangă Street, bl. D5, sc. A, ground floor, ap. 1, respects the confidentiality of your personal data and is committed to protecting the information you provide to us.
privacy.introGdpr: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - Regulation (EU) 2016/679.

terms.title: Terms and
terms.intro: This website is operated by Smile Studio, a dental clinic located in Moinești, Ion Creangă Street, bl. D5, sc. A, ground floor, ap. 1.
